WRITING.TEXT: It might just be because its a photo of the work, but I dont think his nose looks to long just my 2 cents. :)

WRITING.TITLE: Bird over mountains [white and vine charcoal]

WRITING.TEXT: The drawing was of a mirror in a box with holes in it reflecting another mirror that was aimed at a window so just kinda ran with the cube/box concept :)
I used charcoal (vine, stick, and powder) and the highlights are white charcoal
